(Airly, could you tell me where Smokescreen is?  My Maxi, Darkfate, 
kidnapped?)

Chordate/The Protectobots:




Hot Spot stood outside four CR chambers, awaiting his comrades to come out 
fully repaired, Blades being the most repaired and the next to come out.

-----

Chordate slowly got up with great pain, having overloaded on energon to give 
him a drunk like state.  Getting up and stumbling, he tripped over a cup and 
his chin slammed into the metal ground of the Element's mess hall and he went 
back into a sleep like state.
